articles.title: Notice Sent to South Side
articles.content:
Notice Sent to South Side
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on July 11 sent a notice to the south side. It clarified the stand of the north side in connection with the fact that on July 10  the Ministry of Unification of south Korea rejected the working talks for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang under an unreasonable pretext, instead of responding to the north side's proposal for north-south working talks for the resumption of the tour from coming August and a north-south Red Cross working contact for discussing the issue of reunion of separated families and their relatives on the occasion of Harvest Moon Day.
					 The notice said: 
					
					 The authorities of the south side, while agreeing with the north-south Red Cross working contact, evaded an answer to the issue of working talks on the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang. They asserted the issue of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) is the core issue and it is desirable to focus efforts on discussing and settling it on a priority basis.
					
					 This is an attitude hard to understand. 
					
					 The resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang is the desire of all compatriots in the south.
					
					 Taking the view of the south side into consideration, we are willing to put on hold the talks for the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Red Cross working contact for the purpose of concentrating efforts on the settlement of the issue of the KIZ.
					
					 From this viewpoint, we inform your side that we shelve our recent proposal for talks. 
					
					 It is our view that a successful solution to the issues of the proposed talks and contact hinges on the talks on the KIZ.
					
					 How to settle the issue of the KIZ will have bearing on the overall inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south side would be well advised not to misjudge our magnanimity and efforts. 
					
					 Confidence is not achieved when abiding by the standard of one party. It is hypocritical to talk about confidence, selectively approaching the north-south dialogue in pursuit of political purpose.
					
					 We are well aware of the real intention of the south side but restrain ourselves with a high degree of patience.
					
					 The south side should bear in mind if it persists in its arrogant demeanor, making a mockery of goodwill of the other party as it does at present, it will invite a serious misfortune and will have to drink a bitterer cup of setback than the Lee Myung Bak regime.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Calls for Disbandment of S. Korean Intelligence Service
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Calls for Disbandment of S. Korean Intelligence Service
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) is being attacked on all sides after it opened to public the minutes of the north-south summit.
					 Increasing louder is the voice calling for the disbandment of the IS for opening to public for its own dirty politically-motivated greed the minutes of the summit at which the issues of the destiny of the nation and the north-south ties were frankly discussed.
					
					 South Korean opposition parties, all spectrum of people and media are describing the act of opening to public the minutes as a "scenario worked out by the IS and the Saenuri Party", saying that "5-year south-north ties have ended under the Park Geun Hye regime" and "south-north ties suffered serious wound, causing the attack in the field of diplomacy."
					
					 The U.S. newspaper the Wall Street Journal commented that the IS pulled the trigger of political stand-off by opening to public the minutes.
					
					 The IS made an offering of the minutes, a top confidential document, for meeting its own interests, an act putting into the shade the Central Intelligence Agency which earned an ill fame during the "yusin" dictatorial period.
					
					 The IS that came into existence following the Central Intelligence Agency and the Security Planning Board is a den of breeding plots and a base for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It has kicked up the whirlwind of fascist suppression and confrontation by hatching whole gamut of plots.
					
					 Upset by the mounting spirit against the racket for "sanctions" on the DPRK and the DPRK-targeted war exercises that were staged by the U.S. and the puppet south Korean regime, the IS coteries branded those who protested against those moves as "forces following the north".
					
					 The IS is a main architect of the hideous operations that aimed at insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. The IS has also been deeply engaged in scattering copies of leaflets slandering the DPRK and abducting and kidnapping its citizens.
					
					 What shocked the public is that the precious minutes have been abused by IS and other plot-breeding organizations as a tool for meeting their partisan interests.
					
					 As for Nam Jae Jun, director of the IS, he has been so intent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen as to use the minutes as a tool for meeting the partisan interests.
					
					 He described Jeju islanders' uprising as typical armed uprising which the north engineered by mobilizing all factors in order to check the south from bolstering its armed forces and weaken their strength.
					
					 He not only distorted and insulted the uprising, a mass anti-U.S. resistance in which the south Koreans took to the streets against the U.S. imperialists' moves for the division of Korea, but also spread the rumor of the north's involvement, an act of treachery that can be committed only by political crooks hell-bent on breeding plots against the DPRK.
					
					 The present south Korean chief executive seated Nam in the chair of the head of the IS that earned an ill fame for the anti-DPRK smear campaign. The recent disclosure of the minutes of the summit is part of the scheme for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK. Herein lies the gravity of the issue.
					
					 It is impossible to expect democracy of south Korean society nor the improvement of the north-south ties as long as IS is left intact in south Korea.
					
					 The disbandment of the IS is the requirement of the times and people.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should apologize before the nation for the act of opening to public the minutes and immediately disband the IS, a cancer-like entity that stands in the way of improving the north-south ties.

articles.title: Floral Visits to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
articles.content:
Floral Visits to DPRK Missions in Different Countries 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign personages visited the DPRK missions in their countries on July 6 and 8 to mark the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They were a secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, correspondent of the Maritime Territory Branch of ITAR-TASS News Agency, vice editor-in-chief of the Russian paper Rio-Panorama, federal secretary of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation, vice-chairman of the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association who is vice-chairman of the Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, chairman of the Socialist Journalist Forum of Nepal, members of the Nepali National Memorial Committee for President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il and members of the Uzbekistan-DPRK Friendship Forum. 
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length painting of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Health Food in Midsummer
articles.content:
Health Food in Midsummer
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Korea has entered the hottest period of summer, which is called Sambok (three ten days of the period) season.
					 Sambok is divided into Chobok (the beginning of first ten days), Jungbok (the beginning of second ten days) and Malbok (the beginning of third ten days).
					
					 This year Chobok falls on July 13, Jungbok on July 23 and Malbok on August 12.
					
					 In the season, the Korean people have taken hot dishes helpful to prevention of human body from being affected by hot weather.
					
					 The custom is based on the principle of traditional Korean medical treatment or the principle "like cures like."
					
					 The dishes mainly include chicken bouilli, beef pepper-soup and fish porridge.
					
					 Such dishes top the menu of local restaurants in the season.

articles.title: Remembrance Meetings Held by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Remembrance Meetings Held by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- An event of Koreans in China took place to lay a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at Jilin Yuwen High School on July 7 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China, and its officials and Koreans in Jilin City.
					
					 A remembrance meeting of the association was held in Shenyang, China on July 8.
					
					 Attending it were Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the association, and its officials.
					
					 Choe Su Bong praised Kim Il Sung as eternal leader of the Korean people and the sun of humankind as he performed great exploits in the struggle for hewing out the destiny of the nation and accomplishing the human cause of independence with his great revolutionary idea and through his gigantic revolutionary practices.
					
					 His revolutionary idea and exploits had been successfully upheld and developed under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. The glorious revolutionary history of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is given steady continuity along with the history of the leadership provided by the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, Choe added.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Jo Yong Hwan, chairman of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, its vice-chairpersons and Koreans in China also held a remembrance meeting at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on July 7.

articles.title: Four Large Rivers Project Termed Charade
articles.content:
Four Large Rivers Project Termed Charade
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- CBS of South Korea on Thursday termed the project for improving four large rivers pushed forward by the Lee Myung Bak regime as the "most important state policy" a burlesque for building a large canal, an artifice to deceive the people.
					 The Board of Audit and Inspection on Wednesday made public the results of the survey which said that the project has been pressed ahead with by expending money to the tune of 22.2 trillion won collected from the people as taxes under the signboard of building a canal from its outset, the CBS reported, and went on:
					
					 According to the results, the Lee regime officially suspended the construction of the large canal in June 2008 under the ever-increasing public pressure, but the scale of the project has been excessively increased under the pretext of building the canal from the planning phase.
					
					 A working department submitted a report aimed to build a large canal to Lee Myung Bak and he directly instructed building the canal 5-6 meters deep.
					
					 The "government" was aware of the swindles on the part of construction companies from the course of tender but connived at them due to the nexus between the "government" and those companies. The Fair Trade Commission discovered this fact but did not open it to public over one year at the instruction of Chongwadae but sided with construction companies in such a way as meting out light punishment to them.
					
					 In this regard, broad spectrum of people are becoming increasingly critical of Lee Myung Bak's hypocrisy, the CBS noted.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on July 8 held a ceremony of placing a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung at its building on the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					 The secretary general and other members of the organization, Ambassador Jon Yong Jin and other staff members of the DPRK embassy in Havana attended the ceremony.
					
					 They paid homage to the President after placing the floral basket before his portrait.
					
					 The secretary general said:
					
					 It is our noble duty to pay respects for Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people, on July 8 every year.
					
					 He is boundlessly revered not only by the Korean people but also by the Cuban people.
					
					 The friendship and solidarity between the two countries provided by Fidel Castro Ruz and Kim Il Sung would grow stronger in the struggle for socialism against the U.S.

articles.title: U.S. Burlesque to Retrieve Defeat of War Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. Burlesque to Retrieve Defeat of War Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is staging all kinds of burlesques with the day when it ignited the Korean war as a momentum, but with no gimmick can it cover up the defeat it suffered in the war, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The Korean war was a shameful one that shattered the "myth of mightiness" of the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The world people still remember that the U.S. imperialists could not but come out for the armistice talks holding a white flag one year after the start of the war even though they blustered that they would have breakfast in Haeju, lunch in Pyongyang and dinner in Sinuiju.
					
					 The U.S. drank a bitter cup as it belittled the DPRK for being young.
					
					 The U.S. staged diverse offensives behind the scene of the armistice talks to retrieve the defeat. But after two years it could not but sign the document of surrender.
					
					 The U.S. is now stepping up the preparations for the second Korean war to retrieve the defeat, far from drawing a lesson from it. This year the U.S. staged nuclear war rehearsals by activating unprecedentedly huge nuclear war hardware. It drew into them military personnel from those countries which sent troops to the last Korean war and This was by no means accidental.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that its provocation of another war in Korea will bring it only bitter defeat and death more miserable than what it met during the last war.

articles.title: Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Day of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Sri Lanka
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan preparatory committee was formed in Colombo on July 7 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Prasana Ranatunga, prime minister of the western provincial government of Sri Lanka  was elected advisor to the prepatatory committee and Upali Bandara, secretary general of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka, its  chairman.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to mark the anniversary.

articles.title: Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Benin, Ukraine
articles.content:
Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Benin, Ukraine 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Cotonou, Benin and Dnepropetrovsk, Ukraine on June 26 and 29 to mark the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present at the meetings were personages of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Cotonou Institute of Journalism, Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and other bodies and institutions and masses. 
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the U.S. instigated the south Korean puppet forces to ignite the Korean War at 04:00 on June 25, 1950. He cited concrete facts about its ignition of the war. This was the irrefutable truth, he added. 
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin and chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies have ceaselessly staged large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK in a bid to ignite another Korean war. 
					
					 If the U.S. starts a new war, the army and people of the DPRK single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un will never miss the golden chance but win victory in the standoff with the U.S. and the great war for national reunification. 
					
					 The chairman of the Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the U.S. imperialists remain unchanged at all in the purpose and method of their policy of aggression against the DPRK and become evermore aggressive in their nature. He called for launching more vigorous activities to disclose the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK under such circumstances.

articles.title: Swedish Figure Demands Replacement of AA by Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Swedish Figure Demands Replacement of AA by Peace Treaty 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, made public a statement on July 7 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The statement cited materials proving that the U.S. suffered huge damage from the Korean War which it ignited with the ambition for world domination and signed the Armistice Agreement (AA) with the DPRK. The U.S., however, has systematically destroyed it for the past six decades, the statement added. 
					
					 It is self-evident that a treaty will turn into a wastepaper if it is ignored by any one party to the treaty, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 AA has long lost its mission and role as mechanism for averting the danger of war and escalation of the tension on the Korean Peninsula as nobody pins hope on it. 
					
					 Peace and stability in the peninsula and its vicinity cannot be ensured nor independent and peaceful development of the Korean nation be expected as long as AA is left intact. 
					
					 The DPRK set forth a proposal for replacing the AA by a peace treaty and establishing a new and durable peace mechanism long ago and has made consistent and persistent efforts for its implementation.
					
					 To replace the AA by a peace treaty is prerequisite for checking arms-buildup and arms race on the Korean Peninsula, settling the nuclear issue and solving the inter-Korean relations and the DPRK-U.S. relations.

articles.title: Meeting to Remember Kim Il Sung Held in China
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held in China
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting to remember President Kim Il Sung was held in Harbin, China on July 7 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were families of the Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, a Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China and his family, the manager of Heilongjiang Daily and other figures.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the consul general and consuls of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang, China.
					
					 The attendants paid silent tribute to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They watched a Korean film documenting his life during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Ri Min, a Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, said: We recollect with deep emotion the days when battles were fought against the Japanese imperialists under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people and close friend of the Chinese people. He was the most outstanding leader in the 20th century. His reminiscences "With the Century" serves as an immensely valuable revolutionary asset and a good textbook for all of us.
					
					 It is my hope that the younger generation would not forget the precious revolutionary spirit and tradition provided by the elder generation of the two countries through an arduous struggle but carry forward them generation after generation.
					
					 Family members of the Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle Li Zhaolin, Wang Minggui and Jiang Zihua and others also made speeches.
					
					 Looking back with deep emotion on the noble revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and his brilliant exploits and paternal love shown for their families, they said they missed him very much.
					
					 Noting that the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung were successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, they stressed that the Sino-DPRK ties of friendship would be steadfastly carried forward thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various countries posted articles lauding the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung on their websites on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of his demise.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Kim Il Sung, holding high the banner of independence" on June 28.
					
					 The article said that he founded the Juche idea, dynamically advancing the Korean revolution on the orbit of independence.
					
					 The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted an article explaining the immortal flower Kimilsungia accompanied with a picture on July 3.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted an article introducing the historic Kalun meeting under the title of "Historical occasion of Korean revolution" on July 1.
					
					 Seen on the Polish website "DPRK" the next day was an article titled "Independent power" accompanied with videos and photos documenting his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung was the father of the Korean people.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the Koreans.
					
					 But for his leadership independence, military capability and the development of national economy ensuring the DPRK's prosperity and security would have been unthinkable.
					
					 Many years have passed since his demise but all the Korean people always remember the image of the tender-hearted President.

articles.title: SNI obstaculiza la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
SNI obstaculiza la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, comenta ACNC
						
 Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- Despues de publicada la nota de dialogo de la Cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea, el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea se va cayendo en el callejon sin salida.
					 Se hacen cada dia mas fuertes en el Sur de Corea las demandas de que disuelvan el SNI que para satisfacer sus sucias ambiciones politicas, publico ese documento supersecreto que recoge los debates francos sobre el problema de destino nacional y el de relaciones N-S.
					
					 Los partidos opositores, los habitantes de diferentes sectores y los medios de prensa deploran el caso como "guion disenado por el SNI y el Partido Saenuri" y opinan que "se acabaron las relaciones S-N de 5 anos del gobierno de Paek Geun-hye" y "fueron golpeadas duro las relaciones S-N y la diplomacia".
					
					 El periodico estadounidense Wall Street Journal comento que el SNI apreto el gatillo de enfrentamiento politico, al revelar la nota de dialogo de la cumbre intercoreana.
					
					 Asi que el SNI supera la criminalidad de su antecesora, la Agencia Central de Inteligencia que gano mala fama durante la dictadura de "renovacion".
					
					 Al igual que la Agencia Central de Inteligencia y el Departamento de Planificacion para la Seguridad, otra entidad antecesora, el SNI es antro de conspiracion y cuartel general de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					 Atemorizados ante el creciente clima contra la campana de "sancion" y los ejercicios de guerra de agresion de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los pandilleros del SNI reprimen demencialmente a los luchadores calificandolos de "fuerzas pronortenas".
					
					 Entre sus inauditos crimenes se cuentan el atentado contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC y el rapto y secuestro de habitantes norcoreanos. 
					
					 Causa consternacion el hecho de que la nota de cumbre intercoreana fue abusada por ese organo de conspiracion para los intereses fraccionalistas.
					
					 El actual presidente del SNI, Nam Jae Jun, es un tipejo capaz de eso y tan conflictivo con la connacional RPDC.
					
					 El habia dicho que el Levantamiento Popular de la Isla Jeju fue "el representativo de los rebeliones armados causados por el Norte de Corea usando todos los recursos para impedir el aumento de combatividad del ejercito surcoreano y reducir sus fuerzas".
					
					 La tergiversacion del citado levantamiento, resistencia masiva contra el intento norteamericano de dividir a la nacion coreana, y la insistencia en la intervencion de la RPDC son un crimen antinacional que puede cometer solo ese estafador politico.
					
					 El nombramiento de Nam como jefe del SNI parte de la intencion de la actual mandataria surcoreana de recrudecer la campana de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					 Mientras exista el SNI, no se puede esperar la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana ni la mejora de relaciones N-S.
					
					 La disolucion de ese aparato es demanda de la epoca y la opinion publica.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas deben pedir disculpas a la nacion por haber publicado la nota de cumbre y descomponer inmediatamente el SNI, ente canceroso que impide la mejora de las relaciones N-S.

articles.title: CRPP envia aviso al Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP envia aviso al Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 10, el Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea rehuso con pretextos injustos la iniciativa de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de sostener las conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur de Corea para reanudar el turismo al monte Kumgang desde agosto venidero aunque si acepto el contacto de trabajo de la Cruz Roja N-S para discutir el problema de organizar el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto lunar, fiesta folclorica).
					 El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria remitio el dia 11 a la parte Sur un aviso que refleja la posicion de la RPDC al respecto.
					
					 En cuanto a la propuesta de la RPDC, las autoridades surcoreanas aceptaron el contacto de trabajo de cruz roja Norte-Sur, pero eludieron la respuesta sobre el tema de conversaciones para el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang, diciendo que es deseable concentrarse en debatir y resolver con prioridad el problema de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, porque este es asunto medular, comienza el aviso y continua:
					
					 Esa actitud es dificil de comprender.
					
					 La reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang es la aspiracion unanime de los compatriotas surcoreanos.
					
					 Sin embargo, tomando en consideracion la opinion de la parte Sur, proponemos posponer tanto las conversaciones sobre el turismo como el contacto de cruz roja para concentrarse en la solucion del problema de la ZIK.
					
					 En ese sentido, avisamos que nos retractamos de la iniciativa sobre esos ambos dialogos.
					
					 Consideramos que las conversaciones y el contacto, propuestos esta vez, dependen del dialogo sobre la ZIK.
					
					 El futuro destino del problema de la ZIK ejercera influencias sobre las relaciones intercoreanas en general.
					
					 La parte Sur no debera malinterpretar la magnanimidad y los esfuerzos de nuestra parte.
					
					 La confianza no se logra cumpliendo la pauta de una parte y es actitud hipocrita hablar de ella tratando selectivamente los dialogos intercoreanos acorde a los objetivos politicos.
					
					 Sabemos bien la intencion verdadera de la parte Sur, pero nos controlamos con gran paciencia.
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas deben darse cuenta de que se buscaran mayores desgracias y sufriran peores fracasos que los del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak si continuan con sus actos verbales groseros burlandose de la buena fe de la contraparte.

articles.title: Se reportan danos por inundaciones en zona central
articles.content:
Se reportan danos por inundaciones en zona central
 Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- Segun los datos  preliminares, murieron dos personas debido a las lluvias torrenciales caidas desde las 14:00 del dia 9 hasta las 18:00 del dia 11.
					 Quedaron destruidas y anegadas 120 edificios de viviendas en la provincia de Kangwon, 19 en la de Hwanghae del Norte y 15 en la de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					 Mas de 760 personas se quedaron sin viviendas.
					
					 Por otra parte, en las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Kangwon fueron anegadas mas de mil 720 hectareas de tierra cultivable.

articles.title: Platos tonificantes recomendados para el periodo canicular
articles.content:
Platos tonificantes recomendados para el periodo canicular
 Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- En esta estacion canicular, los restaurantes de Corea se llenan de los clientes que buscan los platos tonificantes.
					 El periodo mas sofocante del ano se llama en Corea como "Sambok (dias caniculares)" que se divide en 3 etapas: Chobok (comienzo de canicula), Jungbok (mediados de canicula) y Malbok (fin de canicula).
					
					 Para combatir el calor asfixiante, los coreanos se alimentan desde antiguedad con los platos reconstituyentes como la sopa de Tangogi y pollo, la sopa picante de res, gachas de frijoles, pescados y almeja, paella y asado de anguilas.
					
					 Chobok, Jungbok y Malbok de este ano caen en los dias 13 y 23 de julio y en el 12 de agosto, respectivamente.
